name: Blood Moon: The Last Stand
description: Blood Moon: The Last Stand is a 2D horde-mode "action-clicker" where you will fight countless hordes of vicious enemies. You have total control of your character, survive as the hordes grow stronger and deadlier. As the last survivor in humanity's struggle against the Defiled, make your last stand!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98 or greater DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
